activity.description: The time spent on a given activity (tasks, sports, etc.).

plain.description: Plain activity event with no specific content; the activity is defined by the event's stream, time and duration, and possibly description and tags.

summary.description: To record the summary of a given activity.

activeEnergyBurned.description: Amount of active energy that the user has burned during the day. Unit: kcal.

activeEnergyBurnedGoal.description: The user’s daily goal for active energy burned.. Unit: kcal.

appleExerciseTime.description: Amount of time that the user has spent exercising during the day. Unit: min

appleExerciseTimeGoal.description: The user’s daily exercise goal. Unit: min

appleStandHours.description: Number of stand hours that the user has earned during the day. Unit: count

appleStandHoursGoal.description: The user’s daily goal for stand hours. Unit: count

appleStandHour.description: Indicate whether the user stood during the sample’s duration
